comments.body: Good idea! This would make it immune to lava and fire, right?
Yes please! I could see horns being part of alarm systems or fog horns and a few other applications!
This would be a great idea. Please add this to the game Mojang Studios!
maybe u could assign allays to a specific armour stand by pressing (xbox) LT on the allay and then LT on the armour stand. (Pc) right click on allay and then right click on armour stand
I can't play this but she is so hard
Sono un posto al sole puntata che non mi piace
Jom ikut is a good one and I love you so much and I love you so much
I'm not sure if it's 90% percent that reduces the netherite.
Eu prefiro que adicionem enfeite para Minecraft MCPE
Also, powder snow should break slower with your fists
I like it much better now in Java. Please do not change this back and please change to match java on bedrock. It looks and feels so much better and more realistic without a layer of ice
Yes! Parity being bad as usual, I have many great memories riding boats with friends on frozen biomes.
It's crazy how they continue to promote this feature in Minecraft LIVE and other promotional videos as well, even though they removed it.
This completely destroyed my huge AFK ice farm I had built there. Now over 95% of it is just water.

I also submitted feedback about bringing Bedrock's (better) version of Frozen Oceans back in this post.

Hopefully, being in the Mounts of Mayhem category will help bring more engagement and avoid it getting buried, so feel free to upvote that post as well.
Fun fact: in the bedrock creative menu the sword in combat tab is the old texture.
